sentence:
SUSTAINABILITY REPORT

NEW AUTO: VOLKSWAGEN REINVENTS ITSELF The world of mobility will change fundamentally by 2030: electric drives and fully networked, self-driving transportation will determine how we move around in the future.
label: unlabeled

sentence: With the new Group strategy, “NEW AUTO – Mobility for Generations to Come”, the Volkswagen Group wants to be a significant driver of this transformation and accelerates its realignment from a vehicle manufacturer to a world-leading, software-driven mobility provider.
label: unlabeled

sentence: A company that is redefining mobility while also doing business climate neutrally and conscientiously.
label: unlabeled

STNETNOC FO ELBAT INTERVIEW GRI 102-14, 102-16 Dr. Herbert Diess, Daniela Cavallo, Georg Kell, Chairman of the Board of Management of Chairwoman of the General and Group Founding Director of the UN Global Compact Volkswagen AG Works Council of Volkswagen AG and Spokesperson of the Volkswagen Sustainability Council 1.

sentence: How is sustainability reflected in the new strategy, NEW AUTO?
label: unlabeled

sentence: The NEW AUTO world will be free of emissions, smarter and above all more sustainable.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The key to making that happen is getting more electric cars on the road.
label: unlabeled

sentence: This is what we achieved in 2021: we are the e-mobility market leader in Europe and the number two in the USA.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We are expanding the charging infrastructure in Europe, China and the USA to 45,000 charging points by 2025.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We are planning to build six battery factories by 2030 together with partners and deal with entire battery cycles.
label: unlabeled

sentence: And electric drives bring economic advantages in the truck segment as well.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Only sustainable products will stand the test of time.
label: unlabeled

sentence: E-mobility is increasingly paying off for customers.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Calculated per kilometer, our electric vehicles are already cheaper to run than vehicles with internal combustion engines.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We are driven by our commitment to the Paris climate goals and we at Volkswagen want to be carbon neutral by 2050.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Furthermore, we have embedded the issues of ESG, decarbonization and integrity as points of strategic focus in NEW AUTO.
label: unlabeled

sentence: What is important for decarbonization is a shared consensus between politicians, industry, customers and society.
label: unlabeled

sentence: A key milestone in 2021 was our readmission to the UN Global Compact, the world’s largest sustainable corporate management initiative.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We regard this as a sign that we are building stakeholders’ trust in our strategy.
label: unlabeled

sentence: WEIVRETNI GRI 102-16 2.
label: unlabeled

sentence: What progress has the Volkswagen Group made in 2021?
label: unlabeled

sentence: Is sustainability becoming a business model?
label: unlabeled

sentence: The NEW AUTO strategy signals Volkswagen’s determination to advance electric mobility and establish new areas of business along the value chain.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The associated investments and business decisions are obviously the most important development.
label: unlabeled

sentence: By doing this, Volkswagen is positioning itself at the forefront of the transition from the fossil-driven approaches of the polluting industrial age to smart and clean processes.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Implementing the strategy is causing an upturn in green electricity, efficiency and circular material flows and thus significantly contributes to reducing greenhouse gases.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We also made progress on the management of ESG data and on decarbonization approaches.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Measures to promote compliance and integrity, particularly in supply chain management, are now firmly established across the Group.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Herbert Diess has very clearly spoken out in favor of the energy transformation and higher carbon prices, and a new industrial collaboration has also been started.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Volkswagen has become more innovative and more modern.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Sustainability is already a prerequisite for long-term business success.
label: unlabeled

sentence: It’s long been known how much mistakes cost companies.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Volkswagen’s recent diesel crisis is just one example of this.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Legal changes, the shift in customer preferences and investor awareness of risks and opportunities in connection with sustainability topics mean sustainability will now also become a value driver.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Companies will only be successful in the long term if they integrate these trends into their strategy and activities.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The key word here is “integration” – i.e. that sustainability becomes completely matter of course in all roles and in the minds of all the Group’s managers and employees.
label: unlabeled

sentence: It is just as important to propagate and embed the concept of decarbonization and circular material flows within our business and at suppliers, so what matters is accelerating the transformation.
label: unlabeled

sentence: 3. Where does the Volkswagen Group need to show even more engagement?
label: unlabeled

sentence: Where are the sustainability challenges for a group that operates in 153 countries?
label: unlabeled

sentence: We support the Group’s strategy of concentrating on electric drives and see our job as ensuring that profitability and job security are given equal consideration.
label: unlabeled

sentence: In addition to the technical shift to e-mobility, the area of socio-environmental change will also be one of the most pivotal points of the transformation.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Here we need to help shape this change at an early stage.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Rapid implementation of the transformation can only succeed if we reach the whole Group and every employee and get them on board.
label: unlabeled

sentence: It’s important to us as a works council that a topic such as employer attractiveness and the associated employee satisfaction are factored in.
label: unlabeled

sentence: That’s in line with our Volkswagen culture.
label: unlabeled

sentence: WEIVRETNI GRI 102-16
label: unlabeled

sentence: By implementing new business areas and as a result of employee training, we’re on the right track to develop issues such as sustainability, transformation and employee satisfaction into a success.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The challenge for us is to create standards that conform to the goals of the Paris Agreement.
label: unlabeled

sentence: We’re confident that we can derive rules on the basis of these standards that our international partners will adopt.
label: unlabeled

sentence: However, this also includes convincing people at sites that have to deliver sustainability promises under different political conditions.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Our society is becoming more and more conscious of sustainable action.
label: unlabeled

sentence: Just like with a technological edge, the field of sustainability naturally still has a lot of potential, and Volkswagen can also be a pioneer here.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The business model therefore not only needs to be measured by its monetary success but must also pursue social and environmental issues.
label: unlabeled

sentence: The trend among rating agencies to prioritize the social area in addition to the environmental and governance areas is in line with the Works Council’s principles.
